summary: This document contains detailed call records and charges associated with the account of Joseph Alvarez for the billing period from August 15 to September 12, 2005. It includes information on incoming and outgoing calls, charges for premium services, and various purchases made through the account.

persons.name: Joseph Alvarez
persons.context: Joseph Alvarez is the account holder for the phone number detailed in the document, which includes call records and charges.

keyFacts: The document details call records for Joseph Alvarez, including numerous incoming and outgoing calls.
Charges for premium services such as purchases from Sony Pictures and Weather.com are included.
The total charges for the billing period amount to $30.18.
There are multiple mentions of calls made to and from Las Vegas, NV, and New York, NY.
Some entries are marked as included in the plan, indicating they did not incur additional charges.
